00053  typedef struct command_node{
00054         uint32_t command_hash;
00055         char* command;
00056         char* parameters;
00057         char* short_description;
00058         int8_t (*execute)(int8_t,char*[],int8_t*); //äquivalent zu execute(int argc, char*argv[],int8_t retparm)
00059         struct command_node* nextCommand;
00060  }COMMAND_NODE;
00061 
00062  typedef struct console_line{
00063         int16_t x_offset;
00064         int8_t type;
00065         char* line;
00066         struct console_line* prev_line;
00067         struct console_line* next_line;
00068  }CONSOLE_LINE;
